"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer } from "recharts" const InventoryManagement = () => { const [inventoryData, setInventoryData] = useState({ purchaseOrders: { total: 156, finished: 98, pending: 58, }, clientOrders: { total: 89, finished: 67, pending: 22, }, }) const [materialData, setMaterialData] = useState([ { material: "Cement", quantity: 2500, pendingQuantity: 500, unit: "bags" }, { material: "Steel Rods", quantity: 15000, pendingQuantity: 2000, unit: "kg" }, { material: "Bricks", quantity: 50000, pendingQuantity: 0, unit: "pieces" }, { material: "Sand", quantity: 800, pendingQuantity: 200, unit: "cubic ft" }, { material: "Gravel", quantity: 600, pendingQuantity: 100, unit: "cubic ft" }, { material: "Paint", quantity: 150, pendingQuantity: 25, unit: "liters" }, { material: "Tiles", quantity: 3200, pendingQuantity: 400, unit: "sq ft" }, { material: "Wood", quantity: 1200, pendingQuantity: 0, unit: "cubic ft" }, ]) const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") const [filteredMaterials, setFilteredMaterials] = useState(materialData) // Prepare data for order statistics chart const orderStatsData = [ { category: "Total PO", orders: inventoryData.purchaseOrders.total }, { category: "Finished PO", orders: inventoryData.purchaseOrders.finished }, { category: "Pending PO", orders: inventoryData.purchaseOrders.pending }, { category: "Total Client Orders", orders: inventoryData.clientOrders.total }, { category: "Finished Client Orders", orders: inventoryData.clientOrders.finished }, { category: "Pending Client Orders", orders: inventoryData.clientOrders.pending }, ] // Prepare data for material quantities chart const materialChartData = materialData.map((item) => ({ material: item.material, quantity: item.quantity, pending: item.pendingQuantity, })) useEffect(() => { const filtered = materialData.filter((material) => material.material.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()), ) setFilteredMaterials(filtered) }, [searchTerm, materialData]) const exportToCSV = () => { const headers = ["Material", "Quantity", "Unit", "Pending Quantity"] const csvContent = [ headers.join(","), ...filteredMaterials.map((item) => [item.material, item.quantity, item.unit, item.pendingQuantity || 0].join(","), ), ].join("\n") const blob = new Blob([csvContent], { type: "text/csv" }) const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob) const a = document.createElement("a") a.href = url a.download = "inventory_materials.csv" a.click() window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url) } return (
